title: Is there a wway to upload matches for other people to give feedback?
body:
Please help I am very poor and can't afford any recording software or anything of that sort; is there  way for other people to view gameplay?

I require assistance on how to fight against an unfun character but every time I make a thread about it the community just tells me to get better at her counterplay.

replies.body:
1. Download your match hsitory game, this is a .ROFL file (we'll call this matchA)
2. Get them to down a match of their game (it doesn't matter which it is, but we'll call it matchB)
3. Upload matchA somewhere (or file share it)
3. Get your reviewer to download matchA
4. Get them to rename matchA into matchB's name (we'll call this matchAB)
5. replace matchAB in the same location of matchB
6. Get them to open MatchB from their client as a replay.

VIOLA!!

You should be able to view that match in your Profile Match History on the client, and then you can record a highlight which will be saved as a file you can share.  You may also have better luck looking for tips by asking specific questions like "what should I build in this scenario" or "any ideas how I could have played differently to avoid this?"
